rows.label: qst103318_msg0001
rows.name: Are you guys all right?!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0002
rows.name:
What the-
Elnoth?!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0003
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0004
rows.name: ...Is that you, Da?!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0005
rows.name:
What are you doing in
the Imperial Army?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0006
rows.name:
What are YOU doing
with these rebels and lowlifes?!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0007
rows.name:
Like you don't know why.
Revenge, my boy! I'm glad
you managed to forget so easily.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0008
rows.name:
It's the Empire who let your
ma die. We'll never be
anything but chattel to them.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0009
rows.name:
Of course I haven't forgotten.
But after you left we needed
to survive somehow.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0010
rows.name:
So I risked my life on a chance.
Became a Driver for the Empire.
For my family!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0011
rows.name:
What have you been doing since
you left us?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0012
rows.name:
I told you, boy.
I've been seeking our revenge.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0013
rows.name:
An innocent woman is dead!
She had a bloody family!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0014
rows.name:
All you've managed to do is leave
yet another kid without a mother!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0015
rows.name:
Ma wouldn't have wanted this!
She would never have wanted revenge!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0016
rows.name:
I...I'm doing the same thing as them...?
I'm...no better...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0017
rows.name: ...Are the others well?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0018
rows.name:
Yes, they're fine, thanks to money
from the Empire. What's it to you?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0019
rows.name:
If you can forgive me...
I'll return home to Torigo
and we can be a family again.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0020
rows.name:
...I don't know.
What should I do?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0021
rows.name: Can you help me?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0051
rows.name: What should we say?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0052
rows.name: Hand him over to the army.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0053
rows.name: Banish him from Superbia.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0054
rows.name: Let him do as he likes.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0101
rows.name:
I understand.
I'll go quietly.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0102
rows.name:
You must tell the army
everything you know, Da.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0103
rows.name:
There's a whole network of people
with anti-imperial sentiments.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0104
rows.name:
But I'm just a fringe member. I don't
know anything about the bigwigs.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0105
rows.name: I'm sorry I couldn't be more use.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0106
rows.name:
I'll take responsibility for him.
I'll take him back to HQ.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0107
rows.name: Thanks for all your help.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0108
rows.name:
Oh, take this by way of thanks.
See you around.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0201
rows.name:
Exile...
Then I suppose I'll head for Torigo.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0202
rows.name:
Get an honest job and work to
repay what I owe the kids.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0203
rows.name: Da!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0204
rows.name:
Oh, but before that...you have to tell
us what you know about whoever
murdered Saundra.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0205
rows.name:
There's a whole network of people
with anti-imperial sentiments.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0206
rows.name:
But I'm just a fringe member. I don't
know anything about the bigwigs.
I'm sorry...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0207
rows.name:
Well, I guess I'll be escorting
him to the port.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0208
rows.name: Thanks for all your help.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0209
rows.name:
This is for you.
See you around!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0301
rows.name:
As I like...?
Then...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0302
rows.name:
I'll go home to Torigo.
Get an honest job and work to
repay what I owe the kids.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0303
rows.name: Da!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0304
rows.name:
Oh, but before that...you have to tell
us what you know about whoever
murdered Saundra.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0305
rows.name:
There's a whole network of people
with anti-imperial sentiments.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0306
rows.name:
But I'm just a fringe member. I don't
know anything about the bigwigs.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0307
rows.name:
I'm sorry. I'll leave the capital now.
Head for Torigo.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0308
rows.name:
Okay. Take care, Da.
If I get the time I'll come visit.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0309
rows.name: Thanks for all your help.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0310
rows.name:
This is for you.
See you around!
